relicDescription: NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "2D1C22B04C9CD07F2A22B79EE6DE9DD0", "The Dusklit Revelation is an ethereal construct of tightly interlocked crystals that once shimmered with vibrant hues even in dim light. Thin hairline cracks only slightly mar the otherwise pristine surface of the polyhedral form, it now emits a more subdued, spectral glow. Quiet, ghostlike imagery of merriment and laughter flickers forever within its facets, and light refracts oddly through the subtle cracks, creating haunting silhouettes that flicker eerily across any surrounding walls. ")
name: Relic_Uncommon_Dusklit_Revelation
